official_title: A bill to include laboratory fees for routine cytological tests for the detection's of uterine cancer within the coverage of Federal employee health insurance.

summary.text: Includes laboratory fees for routine cytological tests for the detection of uterine cancer within the coverage of Federal employee health insurance plans.
